src:
Usai PKS, NasDem Agendakan Bertemu PAN dan Demokrat
02 Nov 2019, 15:27 by Alfreds Tuter


Usai PKS, NasDem Agendakan Bertemu PAN dan Demokrat

KBRN, Jakarta: Ketua Umum Partai NasDem, Surya Paloh rencananya akan kembali melakukan safari politik, kali ini dia berencana menggelar pertemuan dengan Pimpinan Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) dan Partai Demokrat.Ketua DPP NasDem, Willy Aditya menyebutkanÂ  pertemuan bersama PAN akan digelar pada akhir November, usai Nasdem menggelar kongresnya di tanggal 8-11 November."PAN kita akan ketemu akhir November. Ini kita lagi sibuk NasDem akan menggelar hajatan mau kongres minggu depan," katanya di Kawasan Tanah Abang, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/).Menurut Willy pertemuan NasDem dan PAN ini juga telah dikomunikasikan dengan Sekjen PAN, Eddy Suparno. Sehingga pertemuan keduanya tinggal menunggu waktu saja."Tapi dengan PAN kita sudah berkomunikasi. Waktunya sudah ada ya, tinggal kapan di day-nya yang belum," ungkapnya.Sementara terkait pertemuan dengan Demokrat, Willy mengaku masih belum dapat memastikan kapan tepatnya pertemuan akan terjadi, tapi dia memastikan Surya Paloh akan bertemu dengan Pimpinan Demokrat."Sejauh ini masih agenda. Makanya tadi saya bilang masih tentatif," ucapnya.Sebelum rencana ini bergulir, Ketua Umum NasDem, Surya Paloh telah lebih dulu bertemu dengan Presiden PKS, Sohibul Iman. Hanya saja dalam pertemuan itu keduanya mengaku tidak membahas rencana koalisi."Belum, belum ada (ingin buat koalisi), itu belum, kita bahas proses pendidikan politik dulu," katanya di kantor DPP PKS, Jakarta Selatan.Paloh menegaskan, dalam kesempatan itu kedua partai baik NasDem maupun PKS hanya bersifat silahturahmi pasca kontestasi Pemilu 2019. Lalu, untuk membuat koalisi bersama PKS menurutnya masih jauh untuk dibicarakan.
text:
After PKS, NasDem Scheduled to Meet PAN and Democrats
02 Nov 2019, 15:27 by Alfreds Tuter


After PKS, NasDem Scheduled to Meet PAN and Democrats

KBRN, Jakarta: Chairperson of the NasDem Party, Surya Paloh, plans to return to a political safari, this time he plans to hold a meeting with the National Mandate Party (PAN) and the Democratic Party Chairman. NasDem DPP Chairman Willy Aditya said a joint meeting of PAN will be held at the end of the PAN November, after Nasdem held its congress on November 8-11. "PAN we will meet at the end of November. We are currently busy NasDem will hold a celebration of wanting a congress next week," he said in the Tanah Abang Area, Central Jakarta, Saturday (2/11 / ) According to Willy, the NasDem and PAN meeting had also been communicated with the Secretary General of the PAN, Eddy Suparno. "But with PAN we are already communicating. The time is already there, staying when the day is yet," he said. While related to the meeting with Democrats, Willy admitted that he still could not be sure exactly when the meeting would occur , but he made sure Surya Paloh would meet with the Democratic Leadership. "So far it is still on the agenda. So I said it was still tentative," he said. Before the plan rolled out, the Chairman of NasDem, Surya Paloh had met with the PKS President, Sohibul Iman. "In the meeting, both of them claimed not to discuss the coalition plan." No, not yet (wanted to create a coalition), it was not yet, we discussed the political education process first, "he said at the PKS DPP office, South Jakarta. Paloh stressed, on the second occasion both NasDem and PKS parties are only friendly after the 2019 Election contestation. Then, according to him, the coalition with PKS is still far from being discussed.
